page.title: 09CUSTOMS
page.content: AT EASTER WE GO PASTIE THAT IS GOING ROUND WITH A SOCK AND PEOPLE GIVE YOU MONEY TO PUT IN THEM.THIS ONLY HAPPENS IN BURRA AND BURRA FOLK ARE USED TO THIS.IN NOVEMBER WE CELEBRATE GUY FAWKES WE BUILD A BIG FIRE AND WE MAKE A DUMMY THAT IS WHAT WE CALL THE GUY.WE SET OFF FIRE WORKS TO MAKE IT MORE COLOURFUL.AT HALLOWEEN WITCHES ARE SUPPOSED TO COME OUT.WE GO GUIZING AND SOMTIMES WE GO IN PEOPLES GARDENS AND PINCH KALE AND THROW IT IN PEOPLES DOORS MOST PEOPLE TAKE IT AS A JOKE.AT NEW YEAR WE GO GUIZING THAT IS WHEN YOU DRESS UP AND GO IN PEOPLES HOUSES AND THEY HAVE TO GUESS WHO YOU ARE THEY USUALLY GIVE YOU A DRINK.BUT WE DONT GO FOR THAT WE GO FOR THE FUN OF IT.
